QuestionList.Question: What is the purpose of <!DOCTYPE html>?
QuestionList.Option_A: provides the web browser with security information
QuestionList.Option_B: instructs the browser where to look for your CSS files
QuestionList.Option_C: allows programmers to link to files in-line
QuestionList.Option_D: tells the web browser what language to expect
QuestionList.CorrectAnswer: tells the web browser what language to expect

QuestionList.Question: How can you make a list that lists the items without bullets or numbers?
QuestionList.Option_D: List have to have numbers or bullets
